search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Salesmsg (salesmsg.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I couldn't access the specific pricing page for Salesmsg. You can visit their official site (https://salesmsg.com) to navigate to the pricing section. Let me know if you need further help!

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1: logo salesmsg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e1a9a65f2fd1331e0f0256_logo-salesmsg.svg)](https://www.salesmessage.com/)

![Image 2: Stars](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/629bd4723be4ddcb55c89e89_stars.png)

An award-winning platform. Loved by customers.
----------------------------------------------

[![Image 3: Inc 5000 Salesmsg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/62c42b748d614264b2abca0f_5000-min.webp)](https://www.inc.com/profile/salesmsg)

3X Inc 5000 Winner! #94 Fastest Growing Company in the SE

[![Image 4: G2 High Performer Small Business 2023](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/67e6bd2f876a993321b40ffc_SMSMarketing_Leader_Canada_Leader.png)](https://www.g2.com/products/salesmsg/reviews)

"I use Salesmsg every single day!"

[![Image 5: G2 High Performer Mid-Market 2023](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/67e6bd2fa3b5d24e7c867ebb_AppointmentReminder_MomentumLeader_Leader.png)](https://www.g2.com/products/salesmsg/reviews)

"I fell in love with Salesmsg!"

[![Image 6: G2 Momentum Leader 2023](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/67e6bd2fd014f8cb31ca6493_SMSMarketing_Leader_Mid-Market_Leader.png)](https://www.g2.com/products/salesmsg/reviews)

"Game-changer!"

[![Image 7: G2 Fastest implementation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/67f40dcd07e497f2cab5cded_badge_bronze_certified_solutions_partner%20(1).png)](https://customers.twilio.com/en-us/salesmessage)

"I absolutely love this software!"

[![Image 8: HubSpot reviews](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/629cb4a5efc23d8eadfaa392_hubspot-fivestar-badge.webp)](https://ecosystem.hubspot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/live-chat/salesmsg)

"The HubSpot integration is flawless!

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/669a338269918beb0df8f337_1.%20TWO-WAY%20BUSINESS%20TEXTING.png)

Send, receive, and manage SMS conversations online
--------------------------------------------------

Salesmsg gives you a simple dashboard to send, receive, and manage text message conversations online or on the go. Engage with your customers faster with two-way texting.

Text using local, toll-free, landline, and short codes
------------------------------------------------------

Communicate with leads and customers the way they prefer — texting. Salesmsg can text-enable your existing landline business phone number or provide you a new one for you to use.

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/669a338168111188d0b16912_2.%20TEXT%20FROM%20ANY%20NUMBER.png)

![Image 11: Team collaboration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/669a3381aded98e91bd93637_3.%20TEAM%20COLLABORATION.png)

team collaboration

Private & shared inboxes
------------------------

Whether you need a private inbox for each sales rep or a shared inbox for your support team to manage conversations together, Salesmsg makes it easy to design the perfect inbox for your needs.

![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b5ad6597151515ddb_ampersand-green.svg)

Provide private or shared inboxes for your team

![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8d2c7f69b5cb8fbece_smartphone-green.svg)

Flexible inboxes support multiple members and numbers

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8e2ca5c76fbc526273_user-green.svg)

See one or all conversations across every inbox

SMS BROADCASTING

SMS marketing made easy
-----------------------

Want to send out a mass text message to a group of contacts? Quickly send a single personalized SMS or MMS text message in seconds. Upload your contacts, create a personalized text message, schedule or send your message now, track clicks & conversions, and see its performance.

![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8d5ad659da12515ddf_upload-green.svg)

Upload contacts and segment to target your messages

![Image 16](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b795a615e524a240d_doc-green.svg)

Send personalized texts, images, videos, & attachments

![Image 17](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b1ee4858127fa0ab0_chart-green.svg)

Track clicks, conversions, revenue, and download reports

![Image 18: SMS marketing made easy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/669a3382a69be50c3a7bfe6a_4.%20SMS%20BROADCASTING.png)

![Image 19: Salesmsg apps](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/66f6d17d19eeb40920815471_5.%20INTEGRATIONS%20(1).png)

INTEGRATIONS

Deep integrations unlock your SMS superpowers
---------------------------------------------

Connect our SMS software to your favorite apps to seamlessly send personalized text messages, make calls, and track everything on your CRM system.

![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8cd05df00c85645d99_share-green.svg)

#1 SMS app for HubSpot, ActiveCampaign, & more

![Image 21](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8d8d80e27d00c1ac34_settings-green.svg)

Deep integrations with the most popular apps

![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8ebd708555a44f6d22_zap-green.svg)

Integrates with over 1,500+ apps via Zapier

Salesmsg tripled our sales in 60 days!
--------------------------------------

"For my mother-in-laws dance studio, we tried everything: local ads, Instagram, Facebook ads, Yelp, even the Yellow Pages, but it wasn't until we started texting with Salesmsg that everything changed. **We TRIPLED the business in less than 60 days!"  
‍**

![Image 23: Samcart](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6a347e31b0c634400d597_samcart-logo.png)

![Image 24](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6e90950a0730c9863f8be_logo-ic.svg)

Text & call online
------------------

Save your thumbs. Text or call from your computer, anywhere in the world.

![Image 25](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/669e2dd88bf2f8cdcfa48b4e_Text%20%26%20call%20online.png)

![Image 26: Wendell Scott SaaS Academy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/64b07f8aa696bee9e7909667_Wendell_Scott%20(1).webp)

### Wendell Scott

SAles manager

Cut no-shows 20% & added $90K MRR
---------------------------------

"Since implementing SMS through Salesmsg, we’ve reduced demo no-shows by about 20% and it helps us bring in about $90,000 in additional sales each month! It's been amazing! "  
‍

![Image 27: SaaS Academy logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/629b901edb005e1c617dc3c2_saas-academy-logo.webp)

All the features you need to succeed
------------------------------------

Everything you need to easily create, send, receive, and manage your conversations online.

![Image 28](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8d3ff4bb2d1fee6f7c_smartphone-blue.svg)

### Local phone numbers

Look like a local by getting a local phone number for your business. Find the perfect phone number with the right area code.

![Image 29](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8be13667cb11463a05_phone-blue.svg)

### Toll-free numbers

Look professional with a 844, 866, 888, even an 800 toll-free number. Send and receive SMS, MMS, even make calls.

![Image 30](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8c795a61578f4a2418_send-blue.svg)

### Dedicated short codes  

Send SMS marketing campaigns from a dedicated short code. Easily send 10 or 10,000 text messages in just a few clicks.

![Image 31](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8dc68a070c304eebd0_user-blue.svg)

### Merge fields

Use merge fields to personalize your text with custom data from your CRM or marketing automation platform.

![Image 32](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b57ffd668d046e156_inbox-blue.svg)

### Shared inbox

Collaborate with your team's text message conversations using a shared inbox. Triage conversations as a team from one inbox.

![Image 33](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8bea256025183fd9dd_image-blue.svg)

### MMS texting (pics, gifs)

A picture is worth a thousand words and now you can easily send and receive pictures, gif's, even vCards with Salesmsg.

![Image 34](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8be13667cb11463a05_phone-blue.svg)

### Call forwarding

Never miss a call with our built-in call forwarding feature. Forward calls to your mobile, landline, or office line.

![Image 35](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8c6151349b7562726a_phone2-blue.svg)

### Landline texting  

Have an existing landline number? Text enable your existing landline and text from the one you already have.

![Image 36](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b70ba6ab592fafc0c_download-blue.svg)

### Import & export contacts

Easily import contacts from a .CSV file, from a list in your favorite CRM, or even by copy-pasting your desired contacts.

![Image 37](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8ba9e1595b35478de9_clock-blue.svg)

### Auto-reply business hours

Setup your business hours and an auto-reply message to send when a contact tries to reach you in off hours.

![Image 38](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8bea25604ca73fd9db_file-blue.svg)

### Canned responses

Save time by responding to frequently asked questions using template Canned Responses in 1-click.

![Image 39](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b8d80e2e4edc1ab04_calendar-blue.svg)

### Schedule text messages

Easily schedule messages to be sent to a contact at a later date. Set the day, time, and we'll take care of the rest.

![Image 40](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8e70ba6aa794fafc0d_warning-blue.svg)

### Opt-out management

Built-in opt-out and unsubscribe management makes it easy for you and your contacts to manage your contacts.

![Image 41](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8bd05df05aed645d86_check-blue.svg)

### Double opt-in

Need consent from your customers to text them? Use our double opt-in feature to connect and ensure compliance.

![Image 42](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8bd006f6f77a5e078b_archive-blue.svg)

### Archive conversations

Move your conversation out of your inbox with archive. And when you need to see the conversation just search and it's all there.

![Image 43](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b8d80e2e4edc1ab04_calendar-blue.svg)

### Calendar integrations

Book appointments right from chat. Add to Google, Office 365, or your CRM's calendar application in one click.

![Image 44](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8d3b68484a51a38ba6_smile-blue.svg)

### Emoji's

Add expression and personality to your conversations with emoji's. Send a smiley, thumbs up, or raise your hands to say hi.

![Image 45](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8ba9e15903c0478dea_lock-blue.svg)

### Private conversations

Provide each team member their own unique personal number to send and receive text messages to keep conversations private.

![Image 46](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b058acd3a960228f1_pen-blue.svg)

### Internal Notes

Add internal notes to conversations and discuss customer questions behind the scenes with teammates before replying.

![Image 47](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8c9c84e5d6f5a14833_search-blue.svg)

### Search contacts

Search your contacts and conversations to pull past chat history, continue the conversation, or start a new one.

![Image 48](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8d1e019479d8b83811_tag-blue.svg)

### Tags

Segment your contacts with tags to create groups to filter, sort, and send unique messages to at a later date.

![Image 49](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6e90950a0730c9863f8be_logo-ic.svg)

Beautiful analytics & reports
-----------------------------

Measure the performance of all your messages, campaigns, and team in one place with built-in analytics, reports, and dashboards.

![Image 50](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/669e2e07334248246bb76236_Beautiful%20analytics%20%26%20reports.png)

![Image 51: Patrick Crowley Electrum](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/629b87ff3be33dfb5cdcd353_patrick-crowley-electrum.webp)

### Patrick Crowley

Director of Sales

One platform to manage all of our texts
---------------------------------------

"The fact that Salesmsg is an innovator in the SMS and business transaction space gave us lots of confidence. It’s proven to be a reliable tool when communicating with our customers."  
‍

![Image 52: Electrum logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/629b87ab2733a74152579329_electrum-logo.svg)

Robust features built to help you scale
---------------------------------------

![Image 53](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61f53101ea314001e3da4e3e_globe.svg)

### Short URL's

Turn long URL's into short one's with our SMS link shortener. Plus, we'll track clicks, conversions, and revenue generated from your links.

![Image 54](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b82c8334348468d02_adduser-blue.svg)

### Text-to-join keywords

Capture leads and build your SMS list with SMS keywords. Unlimited keywords with unlimited opportunities to build your lists.

![Image 55](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61f53101b467313c569d801b_code.svg)

### Website chat widget

Add our widget to your website to capture leads and engage with people in real-time over SMS. Easily turn traffic into leads.

![Image 56](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/622225ab43b229eb6cf81d54_video-blue.svg)

### Video SMS

Easily upload a video and send it as a 1:1 conversation, to a group, or as a mass text message to a list.

![Image 57](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/622225acda2f89bfae3504a9_addfile-blue.svg)

### Attachments (PDF, docs, & more)

Want to share a PDF, Word doc, or Excel file with a contact? Share invoices, files, and more with your contacts over SMS.

![Image 58](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/622225acbc79b700df37f9e5_eye-no-blue.svg)

### User permissions

Set specific permissions for your team for members, managers, admin, and more to share access to specific features.

![Image 59](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b82c8334348468d02_adduser-blue.svg)

### Group SMS

Add 2, 3, or 5 people to a group chat so everyone can stay in the know. Easily add, remove, and see the conversations live.

![Image 60](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b058acd3a960228f1_pen-blue.svg)

### Contact notes

Add notes on a contact for your whole team to see to share information about your leads, customers, and clients.

![Image 61](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b1e8a4e61667dd1e4_filter-blue.svg)

### Dynamic segmentation

Quickly filter and create dynamic segments based on contact info, activity, area code, country, tags, and more.

![Image 62](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8be13667cb11463a05_phone-blue.svg)

### Outbound calling

Make outbound phone calls from your Salesmsg numbers from your computer, mobile apps, and Chrome Extension.

![Image 63](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8bc380b5406947dde6_cal-recieve-blue.svg)

### Receive inbound calls

Get incoming phone calls with your Salesmsg numbers across all devices. Never miss a call with instant notifications.

![Image 64](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8cc68a075ae34eebc7_record-blue.svg)

### Call recording

Record your calls on-demand or automatically record calls to save your most important conversations for later.

![Image 65](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8a7c6f77d8f669a9d3_book-blue.svg)

### Call history

Easily see your calling history on your contact timeline just like your texts. Play your recorded calls and more.

![Image 66](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8be136679def463a04_mute-blue.svg)

### Mute callers

On a live call, just click the Mute button to mute your line so no one can hear you. Click to un-mute to talk again.

![Image 67](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b3bd3573b524fa3ce_chart2-blue.svg)

### Conversion tracking

Understand exactly how  Salesmsg is driving your key business outcomes such as meetings booked, products sold, and much more.

![Image 68](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b3bd3573b524fa3ce_chart2-blue.svg)

### Analytics & Reporting

Get up to date, real-time, rich analytics and reports on calls, messages, conversations, and performance metrics.

![Image 69](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b1e8a4e61667dd1e4_filter-blue.svg)

### Geo-targeting segmentation

Filter your contacts and setup geo-targeted dynamic segments based on area code, state, country, and time zone.

![Image 70](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8cc68a075ae34eebc7_record-blue.svg)

### Recurring broadcasts

Create personalized broadcasts that recur on specific intervals like every Monday, every two weeks, even every 2nd Sunday of the month.

NEW!

![Image 71](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b82c8334348468d02_adduser-blue.svg)

### AI-Assistant

Use our built-in AI-assistant to quickly create and craft personal responses. Type up your text and have AI tweak your responses in just a click.

NEW!

![Image 72](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8bc380b5406947dde6_cal-recieve-blue.svg)

### Ringless voicemail

Easily drop your custom audio message right to your contacts voicemail inbox without ringing their phone.

NEW!

![Image 73](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8be13667cb11463a05_phone-blue.svg)

### IVR (Interactive voice response)

Look professional with our new IVR phone tree calling system. Press 1 for sales, 2 for support, and customize your inbound calls for your business.

NEW!

![Image 74](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8d3ff4bb2d1fee6f7c_smartphone-blue.svg)

### Audio text messaging

Create rich texting experience with audio text messaging. Just record your audio from your dashboard and send to your contacts.

NEW!

![Image 75](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/6346bf03ef4e4c3cf2ed23e7_Frame%20(5).svg)

### Custom URL shortener

Use your own custom domain name for your own links to keep your brand at the center of your messaging.

NEW!

![Image 76](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8b57ffd668d046e156_inbox-blue.svg)

### Email to SMS

Reply to your text messages by replying to an email. Connect your email to Salesmsg and respond to conversations from anywhere.

![Image 77](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6e90950a0730c9863f8be_logo-ic.svg)

Text & call from your phone
---------------------------

Text on the go like you usually do. Now, with super powers.

![Image 78: Greg Hickman Alt Agency](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6a56b282038fed8552e2c_GREG-HICKMAN.webp)

### Greg Hickman

CEO

Decreased no-shows by 45%
-------------------------

"Salesmsg has completely eliminated the 'phone tag' game and replaced it with real-time conversations over SMS. We've decreased our no-show rate by 45% for our sales appointments and the personalized touch has helped our team close sales faster and with less effort."

![Image 79: Alt Agency logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/629b90371dfa803d1f0fbcd9_AltAgency_H_White-trademark.webp)

Safe, secure, scalable, and fully compliant  

----------------------------------------------

We built robust tools and safeguards to protect, keep you safe, and keep you compliant

![Image 80](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8d4358275a53103764_star-blue.svg)

### A2P 10DLC registration

Simple, automated, and up to date 10DLC registration is at the core of the Salesmsg platform. We do it for you so you don't have to.

![Image 81](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8d4358275a53103764_star-blue.svg)

### Toll-Free verification

You're in good hands with Salesmsg's state of the art toll-free verification compliance system. Get your numbers verified in just a few steps.

![Image 82](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8be13667cb11463a05_phone-blue.svg)

### STIR/SHAKEN compliance

Built-in STIR/SHAKEN ensures that your calls don't get flagged as "Scam Likely" by the major telecoms.

![Image 83](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8c6151349b7562726a_phone2-blue.svg)

### CNAM (Caller ID Branding)

Brand your outgoing calls with your company name using our verified Caller ID (CNAM) service to increase trust and reputation with your calls.

![Image 84](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8ba9e15903c0478dea_lock-blue.svg)

### TCPA compliant

Equipped with opt-out management, double opt-in, and many other robust features to keep you on the right side of the law.

![Image 85](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e005adf5b93f9f89f0ddd4/61e6dc8c0cf6527f62f71729_shield-blue.svg)

### Data security

Our vendor is certified under ISO/IEC 27001, secures data between customer applications, and supports TLS 1.2 encryption.

NEW!
